</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns trigger condition check frequency in seconds. <br><br> 

<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The trigger could be [[local]] or remote but the result returned by this command will be for the trigger interval set up locally on the client that executed the command. See [[createTrigger]] for more info.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[triggerInterval]] trigger </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - Trigger object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Trigger interval in seconds </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_interval = [[triggerInterval]] someTrigger;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________
